youtube.title: The Science of Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness (DOMS) Explained
youtube.description: Discover why you feel sore two days after a tough workout. This video breaks down the biological process of muscle fiber micro-tears and how your body repairs them to get stronger. Perfect for students and fitness enthusiasts! Subscribe to MedGloss for biology made simple.
